description:
We have issues with new image 15.0.4 (Ubuntu). When we create new instance in Ice House with older version of Ubuntu or other flavor of Linux, it is working fine but with 15.0.4 image, default route is not created. It is resolving when we add default route manually.

Thanks,
title: When we create instance with Ubuntu 15.0.4 image, default route is missing

comments.content:
We have issues with new image 15.0.4 (Ubuntu). When we create new instance in Ice House with older version of Ubuntu or other flavor of Linux, it is working fine but with 15.0.4 image, default route is not created. It is resolving when we add default route manually.

Thanks,
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ram-kumar2

comments.content:
@Ram Kumar:

The Icehouse relase has reached EOL. Can you reproduce the behavior in Juno or Kilo? Do you use nova-network or Neutron as networking service? Could you append the logs of your networking service? When you provide the requested information, please set the status of this bug back to "New".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
